title: Judge Dredd - Chopper (Complete)
description:
The Chopper saga spans 30 years of Judge Dredd comic books, making him one of the longest surviving characters of the series.

Here are his complete stories from his first appearance in 1981 to his most recent in 2010.

* "Unamerican Graffiti" (2000 AD prog 206-207), 1981

* "Midnight Surfer" (2000 AD prog 424-429), 1986

* "Oz" (2000 AD prog 545-570), 1987

* "Soul on Fire" (2000 AD prof 594-597), 1988

* "Song of the Surfer" (2000 AD prog 654-665), 1989

* "Earth, Wind and Fire" (Megazine 1.01-1.06), 1990

* "Dead Man's Twist" (Megazine vol 2.36), 1993

* "Funeral in Mega-City One" (Judge Dredd Poster Prog 4), 1994

* "Supersurf 13" (2000 AD prog 964-971) 1995

* "The Big Meg" (2000 AD prof 1387-1394), 2004

* "Twenty Years Til Midnight" (Megazine 302) 2010

EXTRAS: Also included is the reprint of "Soul on Fire" and "Song of the Surfer" issued as a 2 volume supplement in Megazines 282 and 283.
